sectionHeading: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday December 20 at 4:00 p.m.

location: Roadway shutdown in both directions between W Seventh St and Granard Ave.  Serious injury collision.
Update 10:38 a.m. - Inbound traffic diverted to Granard Ave.  Outbound traffic diverted to Elsmere Park.
Update 10:58 a.m. - Outbound Broadway now shutdown at W Sixth St.  Inbound remains shutdown at Granard.  Expected duration 2-3 more hours.
